Package geometries

Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
geometries.Intersectable
geometries.Geometry
geometries.Tube
geometries.Cylinder
public class Cylinder extends Tube
Class Cylinder extends class Tube and represents the geometrical shape of a cylinder using height and the attributes of the parent class
